name: node-http-server
description: a very simple and fast http server for node, bash, and spawnable from c, python etc. it is lightweight and great for embedded solutions as well as everyday development or public facing apps.
kwds: a very simple and fast http server for node, bash, and spawnable from c, python etc. it is lightweight and great for embedded solutions as well as everyday development or public facing apps. http server node embedded fast bash c python light lightweight
